text: 20.24 Apo 21.13, Lom 8.35, 2 Ko 4.1, 4.16, Gal 1.1, 2 Ti 4.7 Ak pen takaw ma mɨdeb agak. Yad ke nep mɨdtep gin agɨl gos ak ma nepin agak. Yɨp paklɨnɨgabal agɨl, ma pɨlɨkɨpin agak. Bɨawl Jisas, wog yɨp agak ak nep gos nɨŋɨd, wog anɨb ak gɨjuwin agɨl gos nepin agak. Ak nɨm, God chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup takaw teplep ak, agɨlɨg nep yenɨgayn agak.
